title: Lucifer, Vol. 4: The Divine Comedy
description: With the original gate between the two worlds shattered into a million separate gates, beings from all of the worlds in the old Creation now have the opportunity to join Lucifer's recently opened existence. While neither Heaven nor Hell await them there, the forces aligned against the Lightbringer still have a card or two left to play.and their attitude towards Lucifer's new subjects is a far cry from charitable!This volume contains:Lucifer #21â€“28
author: Mike Carey
